name: Broken Signal (Miguel Angel)
description:
Welcome and thanks for checking Broken Signal

This game is a ThirdPerson Shooter with Metroidvania development.
For which you will have to go getting improvements in your suit to be able to overcome the different parts of the map.

Epilogue.
Base 11521 has not reported activity and has not responded to communications for a long time. We know about the hostility of the planet thanks to its low temperatures. To have an answer to what happened, we send you to the planet to verify what is happening.

Development.
An attack on your ship leaves you stranded on this planet with the coexistence of heavily armed hostile beings. Your mission is to reconnect with your fleet and request a ransom. To do this you must go to the radar area and activate a distress signal.

Controls.
WASD to move
Shift to sprint
C to crouch
F (if equipped) for Slash
Space to Jump
Left Clic to Shoot
Right Clic to Aim
E to interactive
1 or 2 for change weapon
If you don't remember them, don't worry, press ESC to access the pause/map menu and in options choose "controls"

The background music was using PlusMusic. This allowed us to vary the melody at different moments or situations in the game.

This game is about its first versions, and it will be published in the Metroidvania 19 Jam. Soon it will be improved and some errors that could appear in this test version will be solved
